item.title: Quick Note on Market
item.description: I was up early this morning sifting through the market stories. ** Asia: crash ** Middle East: crash ** Europe: crash ** USA: set to open There’s good news in all this loss. First, stocks were overpriced. At some point, they will bottom out and it will be time to start buying. Second, the Golden Age of the Central Banker seems to be over. And that is very good news.
